get.summary: Returns all transactions.
get.description: Returns all transactions, either within a certain range with the from and to parameter, or a certain number.

parameters.description: Request in JSON, specifies the lower bound of the range of which all transactions are returned, default unix epoch

404.description: Not a valid request, see message body

parameters.name: transaction
parameters.description: Model of the transaction to store

get.summary: Returns all transactions of a single user.
get.description: Returns all transactions of a single user, either within a certain range with the from and to parameter, or a certain number.

parameters.description: Request in JSON, specifies the lower bound of the range of which all transactions are returned, default unix epoch

400.description: Not a valid request, see message body

404.description: UserID has not made any transaction, userID not found in table Transactions

to.description: The timestamp of the upper bound of the requested range.

amount.description: The number of recent transactions to be shown.

userID.description: The ID of the user of who the transactions are requested.

amount.description: The number of recent transactions to be shown.

sold_to_id.description: id of the person who bought the product.

authorized_id.description: id of the person who authorized the transaction.

activity_id.description: The activity on which the transaction is made.

comment.description: Comment which is set to a transaction.
